attributes.action: Place a motion of no confidence in the Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Speaker of the House of Commons, Michael Martin, is clearly not a fit person to remain in post. The House of Commons should remove him and replace him with somebody with the integrity and authority to provide leadership. It is the duty of the Prime Minister to show leadership to the country on this matter.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
